definition: the person who asks the questions in an interview

not in good physical condition; not fit, because you have not taken exercise
that cannot be entered, passed through or seen through
impossible to understand

the act of frightening or threatening somebody so that they will do what you want

a person who is somewhere where they are not wanted
that is a basic or permanent part of somebody/something and that cannot be removed
a person who causes something to happen, especially something bad
to make somebody/something unable to live or work normally

the fact that a particular disease will result in death
the belief or feeling that we have no control over what happens to us

used to emphasize how good, bad or extreme something is

extremely large
a lot of unnecessary activity, excitement or trouble, especially caused by something that is not important

to go to a deeper level underwater
